list.text: We implemented TekTIME within Transeco2 to better track our salespeople's commercial presentations and get real feedback from interviews without possible interpretations. By integrating our sales journey, TekTIME has become a true daily tool.
list.author: Davy CHOUMILLE
list.title: Sales pipeline finally working

list.text: TekTIME not only decided to donate a percentage of its revenue but rationalized its approach to choosing the most effective charities. This evidence-based commitment testifies to their seriousness and sincere desire to have a lasting positive impact.
list.author: Romain Barbe
list.title: Growth that felt effortless

security.title: Bank-level security for your peace of mind
security.subtitle: Secure. Private. Encrypted. Your data is safe with us.

list.title: SOC2 Type 1
list.desc: We’ve completed SOC 2 Type 1 examination, independently audited for security, availability, and confidentiality.

list.title: Encryption
list.desc: Your emails are encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-leading protocols.

list.title: Enterprise-Grade Infrastructure
list.desc: Built on secure cloud infrastructure with 99.9% uptime and redundant backups.

list.title: Privacy First
list.desc: We never train AI models on your data. Your information stays yours and is never shared.

pricing.title: Simple, Flexible Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs.

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.subtitle: For organizations that need scale and dedicated support. Best for 50+ team members.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.

list.question: Is there a free trial available?
list.answer: Yes, you can try us for free for 8 days. If you want, we’ll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.

list.question: Can I change my plan later?
list.answer: Of course. Our pricing scales with your company. Chat to our friendly team to find a solution that works for you.

list.question: What is your cancellation policy?
list.answer: We understand that things change. You can cancel your plan at any time and we’ll refund you the difference already paid.

list.question: Can other info be added to an invoice?
list.answer: Yes, you can add your VAT details or any other information effectively to your invoices from the billing section.

list.question: How does billing work?
list.answer: Plans are per workspace, not per account. You can upgrade one workspace, and still have any number of free workspaces.

list.question: How do I change my account email?
list.answer: You can change the email address associated with your account by going to your account settings.

integrations.title: Reclaim 90% of your email time
integrations.subtitle: Email in. Task done. Integrate your entire support stack.

about_tektime_description: At TekTIME, we believe that real change starts with ourselves and concrete actions in our daily lives. By valuing time as our most precious resource, we strive to make a meaningful impact and bring quality and value to everything we do. Through changing our own world, we aim to make a difference in the world at large.
change_world: Change the world, one step at a time

wayOfSupporting.title: OUR WAY OF SUPPORTING YOU
wayOfSupporting.subtitle: Our approach is based on four  <br class="d-none d-md-block" />  essential pillars that we call the 4COs

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Communication is at the heart of everything we do. We believe that good communication helps create strong and lasting relationships. Together, we exchange, share and build a harmonious and productive work environment.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Collaboration is the key to our success. At TekTIME, we encourage teamwork and cooperation. By joining forces and skills, we can accomplish extraordinary things and achieve ambitious goals.

confidence.title: Trust
confidence.description: Trust is the foundation of any successful relationship. We make it a point of honor to create a climate of trust where everyone feels valued and respected. Mutual trust allows us to work peacefully and achieve our common goals.

coaching.title: Coaching
coaching.description: Coaching is essential for personal and professional development. At TekTIME, we support our employees and our customers to help them realize their full potential. Together, we continually grow and evolve.

contact_page.contact_description: With lots of unique blocks, you can easily build a page without coding.
contact_page.contact_description1: Build your next consultancy website within few minutes.

welcome_message: Welcome to TekTIME. We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This <br class="d-none d-md-block" />  privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal <br class="d-none d-md-block" />  information when you use our TekTIME SaaS software.
google_api_services_disclosure_text: TekTIME’s use and transfer to any other app of information received from Google APIs will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements. Link to Google API Services User Data Policy.
information_we_collect_text: We collect several types of information for various uses to provide and improve our service to you.
personal_information_text: When you register with TekTIME, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information which may include, but is not limited to:
log_data_text: We collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service (“Log Data”). This Log Data may include information such as your computer's IP address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on these pages, and other statistics.
use_google_list1: Our application, TekTIME Solutions, uses Google API Services to enhance user experience and provide relevant features. We adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy and ensure that user data is handled securely and responsibly.
use_google_list2: For more information, please review the Google API Services User Data Policy at
google_calendar_data_text: To provide our services, we may request access to your Google Calendar. This includes viewing and managing your calendar events to ensure seamless integration and improved user experience within TekTIME. We use the following sensitive scopes:
usage_of_information_text: We use the information we collect in a variety of ways, including to:
sharing_your_information_text: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.
may_share_info: We may share your information in the following situations:
third_party: With third-party service providers to facilitate our Service, to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services, or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
legal: To comply with a legal obligation, to protect and defend our rights or property, to prevent or investigate possible wrong doing in connection with the Service, or to protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public.
data_security_text: The security of your data is important to us. We implement security measures to protect your personal information. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
your_rights_text: In accordance with the Data Protection Act and the GDPR, you have the following rights:
access: Access: You have the right to request a copy of the information we hold about you.
Rectification: Rectification: You have the right to request that we correct any information that you believe is inaccurate or incomplete.
Erasure: Erasure: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data under certain conditions.
Opposition: Opposition: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data under certain conditions.
Portability: Portability: You have the right to request that we transfer the data we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
Limitation: Limitation: You have the right to request the limitation of theprocessing of your personal data under certain conditions.
changes_to_privacy_policy_text: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when posted on this page.
notifyOfChanges: Notify you of changes to our service
allowParticipation: Allow you to participate in the interactive features of our service when you wish
collectAnalytics: Collect analytics or valuable information so that we can improve our service
monitorUse: Monitor the use of our service
detectTechnicalProblems: Detect, prevent, and resolve technical problems
zoom_overview_description: TekTIME seamlessly integrates with Zoom to boost your project management efficiency. This guide provides step-by-step instructions on adding, using, and removing the Zoom integration.
adding_zoom_description1: Log in to your TekTIME account.
adding_zoom_description9: from the list of available integrations.
adding_zoom_description10: Follow the on-screen prompts to authenticate your Zoom account and grant the necessary permissions.
adding_zoom_description11: Once connected, your Zoom account details are securely stored and used solely to create and manage Zoom meetings within TekTIME.
navigate_the_project: Navigate to the project where you wish to create a meeting.
enable_zoom_integration1: On the meeting creation page, locate the checkbox labeled
link_your_zoom: Check this option to link your Zoom account for the current meeting.
enter_meeting_title: Enter your meeting title, date, time, and a brief description.
select_zoom_option: With the Zoom option selected, a Zoom meeting will be automatically generated and linked to the meeting details.
select_team_member: Select the team members who need to attend the meeting from your project roster.
participant_will_receive: Each participant will receive the Zoom meeting invitation and related details once the meeting is saved.
define_actionable_step: Define actionable steps or agenda items associated with the meeting.
assign_individual_participant: Assign these steps to individual participants to ensure clear responsibilities and effective follow-up.
meeting_will_now_setup: Your meeting will now be set up with an integrated Zoom session, and all participants will be notified accordingly.
login_to_tektime: Log in to your TekTIME account and go to the
locate_zoom_integration: tab and locate the Zoom integration.
click_remove_button: Click the Remove or Disconnect button and confirm your action.
disconnecting_will_stop: Disconnecting will stop further synchronization, though past meeting records remain available.

T&C.welcome: Welcome to TekTIME. By accessing and using our service, you agree to comply with these <br class="d-none d-md-block" />  terms of service. Please read them carefully.
T&C.acceptance_description: By creating an account and using TekTIME, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, you should not use our service.
T&C.user_account_description: To use TekTIME, you must create an account by providing accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
T&C.license_use_description: Subject to your compliance with these terms, we grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use TekTIME solely for your internal business needs.
usage_restrictions_list: Use TekTIME for any illegal or unauthorized purposes.
Violate any applicable local, national, or international laws.
Transmit any viruses or any destructive code.
Attempt to bypass any security measures of TekTIME.
Reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell, or exploit any part of TekTIME without our express written permission.
T&C.content_ownership_sub_heading_4: 4.1.4 Prohibition of Illegal or Inappropriate Content
T&C.content_ownership_description: You retain all ownership rights to the content you create or upload on TekTIME. By uploading content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable, and sublicensable license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, and display this content as part of providing TekTIME.
T&C.content_ownership_description_2: By creating, submitting or sharing content on TekTIME, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable license, with the possibility of sublicensing, to use, host, reproduce, modify, distribute, publicly display, and create derivative works of your content, solely for the purpose of providing and improving the TekTIME services. This license is necessary to enable us to provide our services to you (for example, to enable storage of your documents and sharing with your colleagues or partners).
T&C.content_ownership_description_3: You are solely responsible for the content you submit, share or display on TekTIME. You represent and warrant that you have all necessary rights, or have obtained all necessary permissions, to submit such content to TekTIME and to grant the rights set forth in this section. We cannot be held responsible for any content you submit, store or share via TekTIME.
T&C.content_ownership_description_4: You agree not to submit, share or display content that is unlawful, defamatory, hateful, obscene, or otherwise inappropriate, or that violates the intellectual property rights of others. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms, at our sole discretion and without notice.
T&C.content_ownership_description_5: You can delete your content from TekTIME at any time. However, in some cases, some copies of your content may remain visible if they have been shared with other users and not deleted by them. Additionally, we may retain certain information as required by law or for backup and archival purposes.
T&C.content_ownership_description_6: If you believe that content available on TekTIME violates your intellectual property rights, we invite you to contact us immediately at angel@tektime.io. We will investigate all claims of copyright infringement in accordance with our procedures and applicable laws.
T&C.content_responsibility_description: You are solely responsible for the content you upload or create on TekTIME. We reserve the right to remove or disable access to any content that we, in our discretion, find in violation of these terms or any applicable law.
T&C.pricing_description: The use of certain features of TekTIME may be subject to fees. You agree to pay all applicable fees for your use of TekTIME according to the rates in effect at the time of your use.
T&C.billing_description: We will issue invoices for incurred fees, and you agree to pay them within the specified time. In case of non-payment, we reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to TekTIME.
T&C.privacy_description: Your use of TekTIME is also governed by our privacy policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
T&C.termination_description: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to TekTIME at any time, with or without notice, for any violation of these terms or for any other reason we deem appropriate. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting us.
T&C.limitation_liability_description: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim all liability for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of TekTIME. Our total liability to you for any claim arising from the use of TekTIME will be limited to the amount you have paid, if any, to access TekTIME.
T&C.changes_terms_description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on our website. Your continued use of TekTIME after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
T&C.governing_law_description: These terms are governed by the laws of France. Any dispute arising from these terms or the use of TekTIME will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the French courts.
